sentences.en: ...one inventory of twelve sails for each yacht.
sentences.cn: …为每艘游艇配备12张帆的存货。

sentences.en: an inventory of the museum's contents
Before starting, he made an inventory of everything that was to stay.
sentences.cn: 开始之前，他把所有要留下的东西列了详细的清单。

sentences.en: Errors in the inventory results may lead to erroneous subsequent dicisions.
sentences.cn: 清查结果中的误差可能导致错误的决定.

sentences.en: I was teed off because the chief had me type his inventory.
sentences.cn: 我因主任要我用打字机打他的目录而不高兴.

sentences.en: Inventory may also be viewed from a larger picture.
sentences.cn: 存贮问题也可以从更广阔的视野来加以研究.

sentences.en: Multistage sampling in forest inventory is not restricted to fixed - area sampling units.
sentences.cn: 森林资源清查中,多阶抽样并不局限于固定面积的抽样单元.

sentences.en: So , as we begin, let us take inventory.
sentences.cn: 当我们开始的时候, 让我们看看我们的实际情况.

sentences.en: Some stores inventory their stock once a month.
sentences.cn: 有些商店每月盘货一次.

sentences.en: Some stores inventory their stock once a week.
sentences.cn: 有些商店每周清点存货一次.

sentences.en: The inventory showed that the store was overstocked.
sentences.cn: 清单显示商店存货过多.

sentences.en: The inventory situation was righting itself.
sentences.cn: 库存局面正在恢复正常.

sentences.en: They are just happy to sell their inventory any which way they can.
sentences.cn: 只要存货能脱手，无论采取什么方式他们都愿意。

sentences.en: They're likely to hold big fire sales to liquidate their inventory.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会举行清仓大甩卖。

sentences.en: This is a detailed inventory of all the jobs to be done.
sentences.cn: 这是一张待办事项的详表.

sentences.en: We will need to call on our supplier to get more inventory.
sentences.cn: 我们必须请供应商送来更多存货.

phrases.tran_cn: 库存分析；存储分析；盘查分析
库存系统；盘存制度；存储系统
实际库存；实地盘存；盘点数量
实地清点盘存；编制...清单

trans.tran_cn: 存货清单，财产目录，财产目录的编制，存货总值，清查
trans.tran_en: a list of all the things in a place

trans.tran_cn: 编制…的目录，开列…的清单，盘存，总结
